game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the ruins of a long-lost city.
game.description: A legendary artifact has been hidden deep within the ruins of an ancient civilization. The relic is said to hold immense power, but it's guarded by treacherous terrain and fearsome creatures.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, increased reputation among the archaeological community

task.objective: Gather information about the lost city's location.
task.description: Talk to local villagers and gather rumors about the ancient city's whereabouts.

task.objective: Explore the ruins and find the entrance to the artifact chamber.
task.description: Brave the dangers of the ancient city, avoiding deadly traps and fending off hostile creatures.

task.objective: Ransom the artifact from a rival expedition.
task.description: Negotiate with or defeat the leader of a rival archaeological team to claim the relic for yourself.
